---
title: "Wood Growth"
output: html_document
date: "2025-12-30"
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(broom)

wood <- Bartlett_wood_growth_2005_2024 %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  rename(
    Year = year,
    Wood = wood_growth_g_c_m_2_yr_1
  ) %>%
  arrange(Year)

# linear trend (used in manuscript), there is no trend in wood growth
wood_lm <- lm(Wood ~ Year, data = wood)

wood_trend <- tidy(wood_lm) %>%
  filter(term == "Year") %>%
  transmute(
    slope = estimate,
    se    = std.error,
    p     = p.value
  )

# summary statistics
wood_summary <- wood %>%
  summarise(
    mean = mean(Wood, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd   = sd(Wood, na.rm = TRUE),
    min  = min(Wood, na.rm = TRUE),
    max  = max(Wood, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```
